Package com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Class BondRetryFilter.DefaultBondRetryFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BondRetryFilter.DefaultBondRetryFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BondRetryFilter, GenericListener_T<BondRetryFilter.RetryEvent,​BondRetryFilter.Please>
    Enclosing interface:
    BondRetryFilter
    public static class BondRetryFilter.DefaultBondRetryFilter
extends Object
implements BondRetryFilter
    The default BondRetryFilter that SweetBlue uses. To provide custom logic on when to retry the bond attempt, you should override the onEvent(RetryEvent) method. This will retry the bond only if the bond attempt was direct, in that BleDevice.bond(BondListener), or BleDevice.bond() was called, and if we think it's a possible retry situation. See BondRetryFilter.RetryEvent.possibleRetry().

      Constructor which allows you to specify the maximum number of bond retry attempts before giving up.
